expo.name: Pocket Astronomer
expo.description: An educational astronomy app designed for iPhone and iPad. Built as a solo project during the Fullstack fellowship. Pocket Astronomer was created to assist instructors at a previous job I had in astronomy education. /nUtilized React-Native and Expo to construct the mobile app. /nDesigned to be compatible with all sizes of iPhone and iPad. /n /nhttps://github.com/Kiro705/pocket_astronomer
